com.blockhaus2000.plugin

Interface IpmPluginDescription

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SimpleIpmPluginDescription

    public interface IpmPluginDescription
    The plugin description file that contains the main information of a IpmPlugin.
    Author:
    Blockhaus2000

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String[] getAuthors() 
      java.lang.String[] getDepends() 
      java.lang.String getMain() 
      java.lang.String getName() 
      java.lang.String getVersion() 
      void load(java.io.InputStream stream)
      Loads all information from the given InputStream (An InputStream from the plugin.yml.

    • Method Detail

      • load

        void load(java.io.InputStream stream)
          throws PluginException
        Loads all information from the given InputStream (An InputStream from the plugin.yml.
        Parameters:
        stream - The stream that contains the informations.
        Throws:
        PluginException - If name, version or main is not set.

      • getName

        java.lang.String getName()
        Returns:
        The name that was setted in the plugin.yml.

      • getVersion

        java.lang.String getVersion()
        Returns:
        The version that was setted in the plugin.yml.

      • getMain

        java.lang.String getMain()
        Returns:
        The full-qualified name of the main class that was setted in the plugin.yml.

      • getAuthors

        java.lang.String[] getAuthors()
        Returns:
        The authors that where setted in the plugin.yml. Is null if nothing was setted.

      • getDepends

        java.lang.String[] getDepends()
        Returns:
        The depends that where setted in the plugin.yml. Is null if nothing was setted.
